Error.userEmptyError: Please provide an email, username, or phone number.
Error.emailOrPhonEmptyError: Please provide a valid email or phone number.
Error.field3characters: Field must be at least 3 characters long.
Error.emailTooShort: Email must be at least 5 characters long.
Error.invalidUserNameFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores, and must start with a letter.
Error.userNameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
Error.password6CharactersError: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Error.passwordRequiresUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Error.passwordRequiresLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
Error.passwordRequiresNumber: Password must contain at least one number.
Error.passwordRequiresSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character (e.g. !@#$%^&*).
Error.firstnameTooShort: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
Error.firstnameTooLong: First name must not exceed 30 characters.
Error.firstnameFormatError: First name can only contain letters and spaces.
Error.lastnameTooShort: Last name must be at least 2 characters long.
Error.lastnameTooLong: Last name must not exceed 30 characters.
Error.lastnameFormatError: Last name can only contain letters and spaces.
Error.invalidDate: The date format is invalid. Please enter a valid date.
Error.futureDate: The date cannot be in the future. Please enter a past or present date.
Error.ageRestriction: You must meet the minimum age requirement to proceed.
Error.companynameTooShortError: Company name must be at least 3 characters long.
Error.companynameTooLongError: Company name must not exceed 20 characters.
Error.companynameFormatError: Company name can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores, and must start with a letter.
Error.6CharactersError: Activation code must be exactly 6 characters long.
Error.NumberError: Activation code must contain only numbers.
Error.nameError: Category name must be at most 20 characters long.
Error.ategoryFormatError: Category name must not contain any digits.
Error.startDateAfterEndDate: Start date cannot be after end date.

Auth.signupDescription: Get started now by entering your email or connecting with your Microsoft or Google account.
Auth.loginDescription: Welcome back! Log in to Roodx using your email, Microsoft, or Google account.
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter the email address or phone number linked to your account, and weâ€™ll send you instructions to reset your password.
Auth.verificationEmailDescription: We have just sent a 6-digit code to your email:
Auth.verificationPhoneDescription: We have just sent a 6-digit code to your phone:
Auth.setNewPasswordDescription: Your new password must be different from previously password
Auth.successfullyPasswordDescription: Your password has been changed successfully. Update your password periodically.

accordion.coreDescription: Start with the essentials! Completing these sections will make it easier for recruiters and connections to find you.
accordion.recommendedDescription: Filling out these sections will boost your credibility and open the door to more opportunities.
accordion.additionalDescription: Bring more personality to your profile! These sections will help you expand your network and foster stronger connections.
